name: UIDynamicBehavior
desc: An object that confers a behavioral configuration on one or more dynamic items, for their participation in 2D animation.

items.name: var action: (() -> Void)?
items.desc: The block you want to execute during dynamic animation.

items.name: func addChildBehavior(UIDynamicBehavior)
items.desc: Adds a dynamic behavior, as a child, to a custom dynamic behavior.

items.name: var childBehaviors: [UIDynamicBehavior]
items.desc: Returns the array of dynamic behaviors that are children of a custom dynamic behavior.

items.name: func removeChildBehavior(UIDynamicBehavior)
items.desc: Removes a child dynamic behavior from a custom dynamic behavior.

items.name: var dynamicAnimator: UIDynamicAnimator?
items.desc: The dynamic animator that the dynamic behavior is associated with.

items.name: func willMove(to: UIDynamicAnimator?)
items.desc: Called when the dynamic behavior is added to, or removed from, a dynamic animator.
